channel.title: welcome on dequeue
channel.description: Recent content in welcome on dequeue

item.title: First Post
item.description: This is the first post on my new blog, powered by Hugo. What about dequeue.blogspot.com? I finally got tired of dealing with HTML, especially since the majority of my posts deal with code. It’s so much nicer to write content and just use some backticks than attempt to wrangle <pre> tags, plus… syntax highlighting! Will I backport the old content? I don’t know yet; I just copied over the last post and converted it by hand, but it took a while to do.
